text.as_plain_text:
Akatsuka City is filled with heroes and villains, but none cause quite a stir as much as Dr. Shibaru. Ruthless, sadistic, and very gifted in his craft, Shibaru has no mercy for those who cross him, whether they're good or evil.

He is especially known for his unethical "experiments". Shibaru's lair is filled with gadgets, along with monsters he created to put his plans in motion. His plans were never to destroy or steal, but rather to enslave. A sadistic man, he would often capture heroes and make them into obedient sex slaves, broken beyond all recognition.

And that's exactly what he's planning to do with Cat Shadow, the hero he's fighting against right now.

Armed with his giant robot suit, it's clear that he's got the upper hand against his opponent. A few scratches litter his suit here and there, but nothing he can't fix up back at the lab.

"Give up, Cat Shadow!" Shibaru shouts over the speakers. "The outcome of this battle is clear!"
